explanation: [0-0] An elderly man wearing a red shirt and beige shorts, and glasses, is sitting on a chair. The chair is placed on yellow tiles in front of a bus stop. To the left of the elderly man stand a man in a gray shirt and a woman in a blue shirt with a white bag. In front of the elderly man is a road with railings alongside it, and a blue bus is on the road.

[0-4] At this moment, the blue bus drives up to the elderly man, and he stands up, folding the chair into a cane. Then the shot changes, and the elderly man is now wearing a white shirt and beige pants, holding the green chair folded as a cane in his left hand. Immediately, he unfolds the cane back into a chair and sits down.
